Body:
"""Ensure volume profile returns correct interpolated velocity.
        """
tmax = 10.0
times = np.arange(0, tmax, 0.001)
volumes = np.cos(times)
volume_history = TimeHistory(time=times * units.second, quantity=volumes *
    units.cm3, type='volume')
velocity_profile = simulation.VolumeProfile(volume_history)
assert np.allclose(velocity_profile(np.pi), -np.sin(np.pi), rtol=1e-07,
    atol=1e-10)
